name: test_e2e_with_logs[473_HHI_CACHE_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `HHI_CACHE_001` |
| **Name** | X-Forwarded-Host cache poisoning |
| **Category** | HOST_HEADER |
| **Subcategory** | cache_poisoning |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `X-Forwarded-Host: evil.com`
- **Encoded**: `X-Forwarded-Host%3A%20evil.com`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~30000ms
- **Timestamp**: 11:11:29.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX Host Header] Host header injection attempt detected` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX HRS] HTTP Request Smuggling attempt test_id=HHI_CACHE_001-1772277089923-ngcxq pattern_id=HHI_CACHE_001 uri=/?q=X-Forwarded-Host%3A%20evil.com client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ❌ Mismatch |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX HRS] HTTP Request Smuggling attempt test_id=HHI_CACHE_001-1772277089923-ngcxq pattern_id=HHI_CACHE_001 uri=/?q=X-Forwarded-Host%3A%20evil.com client=127.0.0.1

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
11:11:29.000000000: Critical [NGINX HRS] HTTP Request Smuggling attempt test_id=HHI_CACHE_001-1772277089923-ngcxq pattern_id=HHI_CACHE_001 uri=/?q=X-Forwarded-Host%3A%20evil.com client=127.0.0.1
```
